name: Slime Run (lin25)
description:
How to Play

  • Up/Down key to move
  • Eat smaller ball, avoid bigger ones
  • Toggle effects using corresponding number keys

Credits

Slime sprite - https://stealthix.itch.io/animated-slimes

BGM("Let's Go") - https://zakiro101.itch.io/

Sound Effects - Zapsplat.com

Lisa Ye, Haroon Sherjan,  Duc Tran
